name: Timothy Botington: The Fight for Humanity
name_original: Timothy Botington: The Fight for Humanity
description:
Timothy Botington is a young nanobot who isn’t happy with his fellow nanobots who are on a journey to take over humanity with their magic mind control abilities. After years of silently watching humanity fall, Timothy decides he’s had enough and goes on a murderous rampage to try to take down his brethren and save humanity.

Names of other developers:

Joey Lyons (@Omurex on itch.io)

Quincy Gomes Cedeno (@SnidePiano9157 on twitter and GameJolt)

Leah Nelson

Matthew Curran

Lucas Simmons
